org.bubblecloud.zigbee.api.cluster.impl.core

Class ByteArrayOutputStreamSerializer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bubblecloud.zigbee.api.cluster.impl.core.ByteArrayOutputStreamSerializer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ZBSerializer

    public class ByteArrayOutputStreamSerializer
extends java.lang.Object
implements ZBSerializer
    The implementation of the ZBSerializer that will replace the DefaultSerializer.
    In fact, this class does not require the user to build in advance a payload buffer.
    Since:
    0.7.1
    Version:
    $LastChangedRevision: 799 $ ($LastChangedDate: 2013-08-06 19:00:05 +0300 (Tue, 06 Aug 2013) $)
    Author:
    Stefano "Kismet" Lenzi

      void appendObject(java.lang.Object data)
      Since version 0.4.0 the method must not used, use ZBSerializer.appendZigBeeType(Object, ZigBeeType) instead.
      This method has a conceptual bug in respect to appending 8, 16, or 24 bit long data, in fact
      the methods can only fail in such cases.

      • appendObject

        public void appendObject(java.lang.Object data)
        Description copied from interface: ZBSerializer
        Since version 0.4.0 the method must not used, use ZBSerializer.appendZigBeeType(Object, ZigBeeType) instead.
        This method has a conceptual bug in respect to appending 8, 16, or 24 bit long data, in fact
        the methods can only fail in such cases.
        Specified by:
        appendObject in interface ZBSerializer
        Parameters:
        data - Object to serialize as Java type
